name: A tarnished silver ring with nine gemstones
data: It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
The gemstones of this ring contain a volatile enchantment that is empowered
by the absorbance of hostile magics. This energy can then be 'released' to
provide a corresponding protection against the ravages of the world.
The power of the protection is relative to the amount of magic that has been
Once the energy has been released, the resulting protection remains in place
until it has been completely expelled by subsequent assaults. During this time
further attempts of release are impossible.
